results.title: Stanford President Will Resign After Report Found Flaws in His Research

results.title: What a ‘Human-Centered’ Approach Can Do for Workers With Disabilities
results.abstract: Obtaining reasonable accommodations is often a messy, frustrating process for both employees and their managers. But there are solutions.

Companies tend to focus on compliance and risk mitigation, she said, rather than a “more human-centered approach to accessibility.”
